fields.name: RSK VEHICLE SAFETY CHECKS
fields.description:
Owned Vehicle, Personal Vehicle and Long Term Vehicle Hire (>1 week)
Frequency of inspection: Complete and document at least once per week. Status of last inspection must always be confirmed prior to vehicle use.

field_options.custom_html:
[field_name]

[if description]
[description]
[/if description] [collapse_this]

fields.name: Mileage
fields.description:
Total miles, not trip
N.B. RSK vehicles should be serviced every 10,000 miles or six months (whichever is soonest)

On visual inspection are the following satisfactory?
Yes

field_options.custom_html: [description]

fields.name: HTML
fields.description:
TYRES (visual inspection)

Tyres on RSK vehicles MUST have a tread depth of at least 3mm over the centre 75% of each tyre (i.e not the edges). Should you find less then 3mm, contact vehicle maintainer to arrange a replacement tyre.
